column1: Smoque BBQ////As a lifelong Chicagoan my idea of BBQ is different than down south
column2: but I'm definitely the type to get up to my elbows in sauce without shame.  As I was about 75 feet from the entrance the aroma of BBQ hit me and got a big OMG.  I got the chopped brisket platter with two sides
column3: a taste portion of St. Louis ribs
column4: and peach cobbler.  Here's the breakdown:
